projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A fully responsive portfolio website showcasing my projects, blog posts, and certifications. Built using React and CSS.

projects.title: Typing Test App
projects.description: A typing speed test app that calculates words per minute and accuracy. Developed using React and Node.js.

projects.title: Diabetes Management System
projects.description: An AI-powered system that recommends personalized diet and exercise plans for diabetic patients in India. Built during an internship at RAPID Centre.

projects.title: Arcade-Style Game
projects.description: An engaging arcade-style game developed using Pygame and MySQL, featuring multiple levels and challenges.

projects.title: IPL Auction UI
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce website with user authentication, product management, and payment integration. Built using MERN stack.
